column4: Any web devs who have a preference for using ubuntu on their main machine? Join me over at #ubuntu-offtopic for a discussion.
don't do that, please. If it's offtopic for here, then asking people to join you elsewhere to discuss it is also offtopic for here ;P
I never know what's offtopic -- even when it's Ubuntu related. Thought I'd try something new.
If it's an Ubuntu technical support question or an answer to same, it's ontopic for here.
